channel.title: Making new players go through tutorial island?
channel.description:
I'm running a server for the other kids in my programming class, and I want to make the server as much like the original game as possible.
Any help with this? For example making players go through the tutorial island first.
Thanks!

item.title: Making new players go through tutorial island?
item.dc:creator: @bakedleaf bakedleaf
item.description:
@bakedleaf wrote:

whoaaa boy, i just started this today, well you all sound like you know what you’re doing

So how do I players START on tutorial island…? I’ll disable the teleporting.

And thanks the dialog would be very helpful, you’ll have to tell me how to use it

item.title: Making new players go through tutorial island?
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

You need to declare a few ints… Disable teleporting until they get off the island. And make all the npcs talk. Bout 3 hours to make.

Read full topic
